plot: A short story about SAM and his incident on the way home from work one night. As he sets himself on a journey to get some answers, he finds himself to find more than what he asks for.
title: Going Home
plot_es: A short story about SAM and his incident on the way home from work one night. As he sets himself on a journey to get some answers, he finds himself to find more than what he asks for.
